name: Pixel Tactics
description:
It's been almost twenty years since I created the first version of The Battle for Wesnoth, and I decided it would be fun to revisit the game and setting and reuse many of the assets to try and make something new!

Enter "Pixel Tactics", a 4x game of strategy where you must defeat the evil queen on one large, randomly generated map, but with all the tactics of Wesnoth. Complete quests, find items, choose allies, and battle your way to the throne. In Battle for Wesnoth, there was a day/night cycle, in a strategy game there is a Summer/Winter cycle, and the bitter cold of Winter is always around the corner ready to lay waste to your plans.

Almost all images are reused from Battle for Wesnoth. See here for licensing terms of the images.
